entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
